definition[0]: a purple or brown mark on your skin that you get because you have fallen, been hit etc
definition[1]: a mark on a piece of fruit that spoils its appearance
definition[2]: if part of your body bruises, or if you bruise part of your body, it gets hit or hurt and a bruise appears
example[1]: She fell off her bike and bruised her knee.
definition[3]: to affect someone badly and make them feel less confident
example[2]: The incident had bruised his pride.
definition[4]: if a piece of fruit bruises, or is bruised, it gets a bruise by being hit, dropped etc
